PHRASE.LANG: Get yer Hot Pepper right here! Cozy up to the heat of the sign on the wall in all it's shining glory. Hallelujah!
C'est chaud, chaud, chaud ! Accroche-la au mur et relaxe-toi dans une ambiance chaleureuse. Alléluia !
Hier bekommst du deine Chilischote! Mit dieser scharfen Neonlampe an der Wand wird es dir im Nu ganz warm. Halleluja!
Ottieni il tuo peperoncino piccante qui! Senti il calore dell'insegna appesa al muro in tutta la sua sfolgorante gloria. Alleluia!
¡Hazte con una de ellas! Ponte cómodo y disfruta del calor que desprende al colocarla en la pared. ¡Aleluya!
매운 고추를 여기서 받아가세요! 벽에 걸린 사인에서 은은하게 퍼지는 열기를 느끼세요. 만세!
Get your Hot Pepper right here! Cozy up to the heat of the sign on the wall in all it's shining glory. Hallelujah!
在這裡得到你的熱辣椒吧！在所有它的光輝榮耀的牆壁上留下熱的跡象。哈利路亞！
在這裡得到你的熱辣椒吧！在所有它的光輝榮耀的牆壁上留下熱的跡象。哈利路亞！
Get yer Hot Pepper right here! Cozy up to the heat of the sign on the wall in all it's shining glory. Hallelujah!
